name: mm-inline-box
description: Several fully-styled inline messages - for use with validation success and failure states, etra info, etc.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of inline message styling to be applied.

attributes.name: maxlines
attributes.description: The maximum viewable number of lines to display in the box, others will be hidden and wil incur scrolling.

attributes.name: fit
attributes.description: Instructs the component to fit to its parent container's width (percent or pixel width).

attributes.name: layout
attributes.description: Instructs the component to display as a styled box or a message only.

properties.name: maxlines
properties.description: The maximum viewable number of lines to display in the box, others will be hidden and wil incur scrolling.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of inline message styling to be applied. Valid values are ('error','warning','success' and 'info')

properties.name: layout
properties.description: Instructs the component to display as a styled box or a message only. Valid values are ('default', 'message')
